approval_data.project_summary: This project is a simple web application to manage a list of tasks

requirements.title: Create Task
requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task. The task creation process should include a text input field for the task description.

requirements.title: View Task List
requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all created tasks to the user. Each task in the list should display its description.

requirements.title: Application Load Time
requirements.description: The application shall load quickly. The initial page load time should be less than 3 seconds.

requirements.title: Secure User Authentication
requirements.description: The application shall be secure. User authentication should be implemented to protect user data.
